    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Teeming Ghosts](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2292)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 142 <sup>2.0</sup>, [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 61

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This pale wooden wand is carved to resemble a thigh bone with metal caps at each end. Ghostly tendrils seem to swirl around it every so often.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_false vitality_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1523) of the indicated rank. During the duration of the spell, wisps that resemble spirits flit around you as long as you have any temporary Hit Points from _false vitality_, and you can use the following action.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))  **Trigger** You successfully impart the [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition on a creature; **Requirements** You have at least 1 temporary Hit Point from _false vitality_; **Effect** You end _false vitality_ and increase the creature's frightened condition value to 2.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _false vitality_ of the appropriate rank.
